name: Stackin
description:
Stackin

Stackin aggregates historical data from multiple development stages of software. Which drive understanding and meaningful decisions making process.

Getting started

1. Install the Stackin plugin from the JetBrains Marketplace.
2. After installing Stackin, you will see a Stackin Menu on the top menu sections of your intelliJ IDE.
3. Click on Stackin Menu select Sign In. One Form will appear enter your stackin workspace credentials to get access of stackin plugin.
4. For your Programming Metrics Analysis you can visit https://stackin.dev

Feedback

For any feedback leave us a mail at ✉️ contact@stackin.dev
